page.title: 04A School Day by C.Turner
page.content: The bus takes us to school and we start school at nine o'clock. On Fridays after the register we do our{7 and 8 a_day}and then{read.}When Mr.Pollard has marked the register we do our{spelling}and{table tests. Then we have{assembly. Then at 10:40am it is play-time. At 11:00am we come in and do{maths}on the board and if we finish all twenty questions we can{read}until lunch time. We either have school-dinner or packed lunch. At 1:15am we come in and{read}quietly Usually we do work then games.We often have a{netball}and{football match against other schools. At 3:10pm we get ready to go home.I get home at 4:00pm.
